title: Eternal Summer
writer: Leste Chen, Cheng-Ping Hsu, Chi-yao Wang
short_cast: Joseph Chang, Ray Chang, Kate Yeung
cast: Joseph Chang, Ray Chang, Kate Yeung
genre: Taiwanese, LGBTQ Movies, Movies Based on Books, Chinese Movies, Dramas, Romantic Movies
desc: Inseparable childhood friends Shou-heng and Cheng-shing have their world thrown into chaos when a new girl comes to town and falls for Shou-heng.
